name: Family Game Night Fun Pack
description:
Each game is hosted by MR. POTATO HEAD and features rich customization, rewards, multiple party modes, and both classic and remixed versions of the brands you know and love. Play with up to four players locally and online. With so much variety in one bundle, all of your family game nights can be better than ever!

Play 10 of your favorite Hasbro games in one pack. Each game is hosted by MR. POTATO HEAD and features rich customization, rewards, multiple party modes, and both classic and remixed versions of the brands you know and love.
